Name: ListSky
Description: ListSky manages a number of open lists of people, organisations, communities and bots.

Name: Lewis Westbury
Description: Software developer working for the Collective Intelligence team at Nesta.

Name: Joshua Becker
Description: Assistant Professor at the UCL School of Management. Joshua's work is focused largely on collective intelligence.

Name: Sir Geoff Mulgan
Description: Professor of Collective Intelligence, Public Policy and Social Innovation at University College London.

Name: Isabella Roberts
Description: Researcher focused on Collective Intelligence and Democracy.

Name: Centre for Collective Intelligence
Description: At the Centre for Collective Intelligence Design, we create new ways for communities to use technology to harness their ideas and power to act on the problems that matter to them and create the futures they want.

Name: Peter Thirup Baeck
Description: Director of the Centre for Collective Intelligence Design at Nesta.

Name: Kathy Peach
Description: Director of the Centre for Collective Intelligence Design at Nesta.

Name: Collective Intelligence Project
Description: We're on a mission to help steer transformative technology for the collective good.

Name: AI4CI
Description: A UKRI research hub and consortium, bringing together research groups from the Universities of Bath, Bristol, Cardiff, Exeter, Glasgow, Ulster and UCL.

Name: pol.is
Description: An open source, real-time system for gathering, analyzing and understanding what large groups of people think in their own words, enabled by advanced statistics and machine learning.

Name: Computational Democracy Project
Description: The Computational Democracy Project designs, engineers and maintains Polis.

Name: Strategy Room
Description: The Strategy Room is an immersive experience which uses facilitated deliberation, interactive polling and collective intelligence to identify the climate change policies that will best help each local area to reach net zero emissions.

Name: OpenStreetMap
Description: Comprehensive international community mapping project and open geo dataset.

Name: Institute for the Future of Work
Description: An independent research and development institute exploring how new technologies are transforming work and working lives.
